attributes.action: Asylum Seekers & Failed Asylum Seekers should not have access to the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By allowing Asylum seekers and failed Asylum Seekers to have access to the NHS it put additional strain on the already over streached NHS, this is not acceptable. The countries these people come from should have to pay for their people to get treatment in the NHS for un to 5years after entry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
